document.full_text: u.s. stocks advanced on wednesday as materials shares rose, but rising commodities prices due to turmoil in the middle east and north africa could keep rallies modest.
document.title: materials lead wall street higher but turmoil remains
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks advanced on wednesday as materials shares rose, but rising commodities prices due to turmoil in the middle east and north africa could keep rallies modest.
